attributes.action: make non nationals learn english before they arrive in to the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I dont see how we can to go a foreign country and have to be able to speak their language and non nationals coming into the UK are not forced to speak English.England is a big nation and people should adapt to English culture.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
